subject: Re: File from tonight
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Frank, i'm telling you it didn't work at all until recently.  They are 
making it work for a reason, they want me to bring your box and show 
others.  Your box is the best communication i have right now and they 
told me that they want me to only be using your box.  The answers are 
clear and they answer right away.  This is my new path and they have 
specified i am here to teach others, so that's what i will do.

-Steve H.


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> 
wrote:
